attributes.action: Increase Statutory Sick Pay during Coronavirus
attributes.additional_details: The Government must increase SSP, if only temporarily, to support workers who do not benefit from a company sick pay scheme and to give much needed help to the self-employed. Apparently there is a blank cheque from the Government to help workers and businesses through this crisis, so lets do this now.
attributes.background: During the Coronavirus lots of workers will only receive £94 per week, whilst some workers will receive 80% of their wages if they are furloughed by their employer. I have to self isolate for 3 months because of my health condition and I will only receive £94 instead of £320. How is this fair.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302277
